name: MI-PLAST
goal: Being a producer of plastic packaging, but aligning our business with the European Directive on packaging and packaging waste 94/62/EC, our goal is to continue our work through participaton and investment in research. We are esspecially interested in projects developing new biopolymers' structures. Also being a recycling company, using high percentage of recycled raw materials in our production, we are eager to optimize our recycling processes in order to avoid loss of material, in quantity and quality. We are interested in new recycling technologies and improvement of the current ones.
interests: Business and Industry, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives:
-European directive on packaging and packaging waste 94/62/EC
-European environmental research and innovation policy
-EU Strategy for Plastics in a Circular Economy
